title: Ticket #4205: condor_q only parses for "-stream", should be "-stream-results"
description: condor_q command line parsing looks for "stream" when it should be looking for "stream-results". this was fine in the bad old days when any garbage at the end of a command option was ignored, but now that argument parsing is exact, it doesn't work.
